name: Exile (itch) (HexRae)
description:
A 15-minute kinetic novel following the personal logs of an undersea observer.

A work of fiction.

Caution warnings:

-isolation

-societal rejection

-dysphoria 

-body horror

Browser version can lag significantly on some systems. 

If the text seems slow to read, the downloadable version should perform much better.

Made in Unity by Rachel Morgan 

https://twitter.com/HexRaeMusic
